Detailed Description

Date is used to represent a single date.

Enumerator:
Monday 
Tuesday 
Wednesday 
Thursday 
Friday 
Saturday

enum Date::Format
 

Allowed formats for string representation of a Date.

Enumerator:
ShortDateDM  day of month, month
ShortDateWDM  abbreviated weekday name, day of month, month
ShortDateDMY  day of month, month, year
ShortDateWDMY  abbreviated weekday name, day of month, abbreviated month name, year
LongDateDM  day of month, full month name
LongDateWDM  full weekday name, day of month, full month name
LongDateDMY  day of month, full month name, year
LongDateWDMY  full weekday name, day of month, full month name, year
